text: I use Node so I have not tried doing anything with C#/.NET - but there are libraries out there - <https://github.com/HubSpot-net/HubSpot.NET>
Good question!  <@U01QVR44MEY>

Hi <@U072PGW197D>, having a similar issue, was curious if you ever figured out a solution for your problem of having all your drill down properties point to the integration instead of your real attribution sources?

Hi All,

Does anyone know what the messages character limit is that forces truncationStatus to 'TRUNCATED'?
Hi <@U076E44C6UR>, yes I resolved this issue a while back, but in a different way.

The form was from a 3rd party backoffice CRM, so was difficult to make any changes. Instead I added the UTM tags to all LPs directing to it and then set up a Zap to capture these, working fine now. Let me know what is the exact scenario you are facing

Hi good morning, could someone please answer me how to differentiate the business pipelines in the HubSpot API? Currently, we have two pipelines in HubSpot and need to know how to differentiate them so that we can load data correctly into each. Do we need to use different access tokens or some other method for this differentiation? This information is for a programmer who is working on integration with HubSpot.

It would be from contacts who have business in these pipelines, how could you access this pipeline.
I'm not sure if this is what you need, but I was doing some stuff with pipelines yesterday. The endpoints tab has some useful stuff <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/pipelines>

Thanks G, It would be like this, the contacts will be created business with flows, depending on the country will be assigned to a pipeline or another, and the programmers who are working with a private app have to dump data to these businesses, but do not know how to differentiate between Pipelines via API.

With this documentation that you passed me could I do that?
I ask more than anything because I don't know anything about programming, and I'm an admin, so I don't know how to do all this hehe

I don't know the entire documentation by heart, but it has good starting points, like the ability to fetch all pipelines that exist in the account and their identifiers. I think if you give your devs this documentation they should be fine. On the left sidebar there are also links to all documentations of all HubSpot objects, so they can go from there to anything else they might need to find

Hi!
Does anyone know if/how the existing real estate MLSs integrate with HubSpot? Is it through an API or some other process?
Thank you!

Hello!
I am using a calculated field to pass data via JSON/webhook to our ERP.  Does anyone know how I can correctly specify/insert line breaks (carriage returns) in the data?

Here is an example of what I'm trying to do, where the "
" would be a line break.  Doesn't seem to be working.
concatenate("Weight Break for Shipping LTL: ", if(is_known([properties.weight_break_for_shipping_ltl]), number_to_string([properties.weight_break_for_shipping_ltl]), "0"), "
", "Delivery Hours: ", if(is_known([properties.delivery_hours]), [properties.delivery_hours], "0"), if(is_known([properties.special_shipping_requirements]), [properties.special_shipping_requirements], ""), "
", "Shipping Contact: ", if(is_known([properties.shipping_contact_first_name]), [properties.shipping_contact_first_name], "0"), " ", if(is_known([properties.shipping_contact_last_name]), [properties.shipping_contact_last_name], "0"), "
", "Shipping Contact Phone Number: ", if(is_known([properties.shipping_contact_phone]), [properties.shipping_contact_phone], "0"), "
", "Shipping Contact Email: ", if(is_known([properties.shipping_contact_email]), [properties.shipping_contact_email], "0"))
Hi, is there an API to list the available integrations in HubSpot?

Hi, my team is config a integration and this integration create many associations between records with the use the API , but the api return this error: {"status":"error","message":"One or more associations are invalid","correlationId":"40e86245-6193-437d-968f-d03942421316","context":{"specHasAllAssociatedObjects":["true"],"associationSpec":["associationCategory USER_DEFINED, associationTypeId 71"],"ASSOCIATION_LIMIT_EXCEEDED":["Exceeded association limit of 50000 for portalId 20760966, fromObjectId 2425676595, associationCategory USER_DEFINED, associationTypeId 71"],"associationTypeIdThatExceededLimit":["71"],"portalId":["20760966"],"limit":["50000"],"fromObjectId":["2425676595"],"associationCategoryThatExceededLimit":["USER_DEFINED"]},"category":"VALIDATION_ERROR"}
Exist solution to this?
I did try making a "Test Call" on <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts> , still the same response..

The docs also mention upsert API : <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/contacts> (if you check the endpoints)
But weirdly getting 404 on this.
I saw this endpoint pop up 2 days ago
Don’t know if it’s legit or not yet

Doesn't seem to be working with the standard id property configuration. I am trying to create a custom unique property and then use this API. Will update if that works and have also added a question here : <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1718832776019099> :v:
Cool cool, thanks bro

Depending on your use case, there are quite a few existing SMS tools/integrations in the app marketplace. I’d encourage you to check there for existing apps 
<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/?eco_search=Sms|https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/?eco_search=Sms>

If you really want to build something, assuming you’re thinking of bulk SMS, using a custom workflow action isn’t a bad place to start. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions>

Hi, a non-tech founder here building a SaaS app that integrates with HubSpot. When users go through the onboarding flow to connect our app to their existing HubSpot Sales Hub instance (owned by their company), I want the integration flow to look like the below:

1. User logs into the web app and follows a prompt to integrate with their company CRM (only for the first time)
2. User follows the below flow to authenticate and integrate
3. User can now search, select and change opportunity fields and data of their HubSpot Sales Hub within our app
I also attached a quick visual of the above. I understand that we need to set up OAuth, connect HubSpot's API, and define the opportunity fields. Is there anything else that needs to be considered if we want our users to self-service without their IT team providing private API keys?

Also, is there a resource on the data and privacy requirements our app requires before integrating with HubSpot Sales Hub?

Hi dears, I'm going to use HubSpot API's and have a question about integration part. I need to add new contact and do some modification after created. So I want to get contact by email (not id) but don't found that request with v3 (I've found it by v1). So is it possible to get contact by email with v3?
